data.message: absolutely amazing.i think the world needs  alot more of such occasions.actually i saw this clip by chance,cause i was trying to get a help from facebook..first i was gonna ask you to help me an ole class mate of mine,her maiden name was lindsay bartram we used to go to hartlepool rosebank high school in uk,shewas a close friend of susan wilson then and now susan illingworth.and now that i am here i wish facebook sponsors me producing my next film,and before i end my comment,at the moment i am back home in tehran,so yeh internet and facebook is magic,God bless you.
